title: A novel magnetite C18/paracetamol/alginate adsorbent bead for simultaneous extraction of synthetic antioxidants and bisphenol A in water samples
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18136-18146
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02720E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nurma Sulaiman, Nuryanee Hama, Saowanit Saithong, Thitima Rujiralai
A novel magnetite C18/paracetamol/alginate bead (mC18/Pa/Alg) was applied to simultaneously extract synthetic antioxidants and bisphenol A from water samples by magnetic solid phase extraction coupled with GC-FID analysis.
